name: webgl-pbr-dojo
description: Explore physically based rendering with WebGL2

scripts.setup: npm run setup:math && npm run setup:gl2 && npm run setup:tween && npm i
scripts.setup:math: cd lib/hwoa-rang-gl2/lib/hwoa-rang-math && npm i && npm run start:dev
scripts.setup:gl2: cd lib/hwoa-rang-gl2 && npm i && npm run start:dev
scripts.setup:tween: cd lib/hwoa-rang-tween && npm i && npm run start:dev
scripts.serve:docs: run-s build clean:examples create:examples copy:examples clean:docs out:docs
